about_the_game:
Unjustly accused of a terrible crime, Soyeon finds herself in the Kingdom of Spirits. She cannot return home, and a cruel punishment looms ahead: death. How will she survive in a strange and incomprehensible world? How much can one trust the suspiciously friendly spirits? From whom should she seek support—the beautiful and mysterious moon prince or the sarcastic but charming dokkaebi?


The sarcastic dokkaebi is clearly not thrilled with Soyen's presence, but despite this, he's always there to help...even if he doesn't miss an opportunity to let another caustic comment loose. Can she trust someone who has trapped her in a strange and unfamiliar world, or are his motives more complex than they first appear?


The handsome prince of the Moon Kingdom is always polite and courteous, showing true sympathy for Soyeon. But is his sincerity to be trusted? What lurks behind the dragon prince's friendly mask?



- 2 love interests with full English voiceover
- 2 routes revealing the story from different angles
- More than 10 unique illustrations
- Interactive elements and hidden object scenes

Visual Novel, Otome.

content_descriptors.notes: Alchogol use, veiled description and allusions of intimacy scenes between characters

name: Lunar Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: Romantic Visual Novel. Unjustly accused of a terrible crime, Soyeon finds herself in the Kingdom of Spirits. How will she survive in a strange and incomprehensible world? How much can one trust the suspiciously friendly spirits?
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
